title: The principal motivation for drafting the Bill of

content.question: The principal motivation for drafting the Bill of Rights was the desire to

choices.label: test the new process of amendment described in the Constitution
protect rights not specified in the Constitution
strengthen the power of the federal government
restore to the states the powers they had enjoyed under the Articles of Confederation
clarify the federal relationship among the states

content.answer: protect rights not specified in the Constitution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
